sentences.en: ...a white van with smoked glass windows.
sentences.cn: ...一辆装有烟熏玻璃窗的白色货车。

sentences.en: Another man constantly chain-smoked and seemed to have the shakes.
sentences.cn: 另一名男子一直一支接一支地抽烟，似乎身体有些发抖。

sentences.en: David began to dislike all his television heroes who smoked.
sentences.cn: 戴维开始讨厌所有他曾喜欢的吸烟的电视偶像了。

sentences.en: Do you think it would be all right if I smoked?
Eat cured or smoked meats infrequently.
sentences.cn: 不要常吃腌制或熏烤的肉.

sentences.en: He had smoked half a packet of cigarettes.

sentences.cn: 他抽烟抽得嗓子都疼了.

sentences.en: He smoked one cigarette after another.
sentences.cn: 他一根接着一根地吸着香烟.

sentences.en: He smoked the snakes out from the hole.
Herrings can be salted, smoked and pickled.
sentences.cn: 鲱鱼可以盐腌、熏制和泡制。

sentences.en: Legs of pork were cured and smoked over the fire.
Smoked herring is a local delicacy.
sentences.cn: 烟熏鲱鱼是当地一种美味食品.
熏大马哈鱼——馐馔之福啊!

sentences.en: Smoked salmon was considered an expensive delicacy.
sentences.cn: 熏鲑鱼被认为是一道昂贵的珍馐。

sentences.en: The escaped convicts were smoked out of the house.
Use Scottish smoked haddock if you can.
sentences.cn: 如果可以的话就用苏格兰熏黑线鳕。

words.tran_cn: 冒烟的；烟熏味的；熏着的；呛人的；烟状的

phrases.tran_cn: 熏鱼，五香熏鱼；熏制鱼产品

trans.tran_en: Smoked glass has been made darker by being treated with smoke

trans.tran_cn: 冒烟( smoke的过去式和过去分词 )，抽烟，用烟熏制，吸（烟），抽
